main event: A male private individual reported seeing an elongated dark object in the sky that emitted light from its periphery while driving to work.
interesting points: The witness observed the object for several minutes before it rapidly accelerated and disappeared., The object was reported to be about 40-50 feet in diameter and reddish-orange in color., The sighting was reported to the police and subsequently investigated by the U.S. Air Force under Project Blue Book., There are 4 photographs associated with the report, though they show a blurry and poorly defined shape., The radar also tracked a single target in the area that appeared suddenly and disappeared suddenly.
sighted object: an elongated dark object emitting light
witness description: male private individual driving to work
